name: Flying Ninja
description:
fter mastering the art of wall jumping, our Bouncy Ninja has begun his quest to master the ancient art of flying !

Improving on the Flappy Bird formula , you must help the little ninja student maneuver through the maze of pillars and learn to fly.

Familiar Flappy Bird feel to it!
Simple and Addictive!
Precise jumping controls !
Features retro 8-bit graphics !
Achievements & Leaderboards !
Simple to learn , yet hard to master.
Rate this app and show your friends you are a man of action by sharing your score on Facebook
